location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 222/45 'Loss of Company Code Book by Cable & Wireless, Bushire'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf and the Secretary of State for India regarding the security risk for the loss of Cable and Wireless's company code book.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
